original_text: To mitigate user discomfort, clamp any vibrational force applied via haptics to a maximum of 4 N, beyond which it may induce pain or strain.
units: To mitigate user discomfort , clamp any vibrational force applied via haptics to a maximum of 4 N , beyond which it may induce pain or strain .
applied via haptics to a maximum of 4 N , beyond which it may induce pain or strain
beyond which it may induce pain or strain

original_text: To prevent future mismatches, the OBJ importer must perform a metadata scan for declared or inferred units and issue a warning if the units are missing or incompatible.
units: To prevent future mismatches , the OBJ importer must perform a metadata scan for declared or inferred units and issue a warning if the units are missing or incompatible .
issue a warning if the units are missing or incompatible
if the units are missing or incompatible
